3. Under pure uniaxial compression loading, the failure cracks that appear in a cube specimen should be

answers.a: along the surface parallel to the direction of applied load

question: 4. During compressive strength of cube test, under uniaxial compression loading including platens effect, the failure cracks that appear in a cube specimen are

answers.c: along the diagonals of the cube
